document.full_text: the tampa bay lightning struck three successive power-play goals on the way to a 5-4 win over the boston bruins wednesday, setting up a game seven in the eastern conference finals.
document.title: tampa bay beat boston to force game seven in east
lines_and_colors: the tampa bay lightning struck three successive power-play goals on the way to a 5-4 win over the boston bruins wednesday, setting up a game seven in the eastern conference finals.
